thread.title: Diane Lefman
thread.title_full: UpRight Law reviewed by Diane Lefman

author: Diane Lefman
title: Diane Lefman
text: I was at wits end deciding how to continue to pay my bills and credit cards I was doing the credit card roulette to live, it was getting very frustrating once I realize if I quit paying the "minimums" on the credit cards I would actually have enough to live on instead using the using the "avaiable" credit to live and get deeper in debt ...so glad I made the call
